# Problem 9.1 {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement

A beam with a rectangular cross-section of base b = 80 mm and h = 200 mm is subjected to the leading shown. If w = 2 kN/m and L = 2 m, determine the magnitude of the largest bending stress in the beam.
